item.title: About
item.description: Alexander is a software engineer from Berlin, Germany. He is currently working at Trade Republic Bank GmbH as a part of the software engineering team to build and run Germany’s first commission free broker. In the past, he worked at Valsight GmbH as well as interned at SAP SE in Palo Alto, California. He finished his bachelor’s and master’s degrees in IT-Systems Engineering at the Hasso Plattner Institute in Potsdam, Germany.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Today I’m setting up a website using Hugo with the Hermit theme and Github Pages. So it’s basically a test setup right now. I’m not sure yet what content will be delivered here, but I will figure it out down the road.
